epd_metadata.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia

epd_process_certification_body_contact.name: Megan Blizzard
epd_process_certification_body_contact.address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA

epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.general_use: General use concrete including footpaths, slabs, foundations, normal class concrete
product_description.hazardous_substances: None listed in Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging
product_description.classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail
product_description.description: Concrete prepared by mixing cement, coarse and fine aggregates, water, with or without auxiliary agents and additives. Fresh concrete is placed on site or prefabricated, compacted and hardened by hydration of cement.

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options (modules A4-A5), modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified; scope is cradle to delivery
lca_information.time_representativeness: Plant data from 2022, mix data from 2023

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging except packaging of materials

data_quality.geographic_representativeness: Good to very good for all data sources
data_quality.temporal_representativeness: All data updated within 10 years as required

system_boundaries.upstream_processes: Extraction, transport and manufacturing of raw materials; generation of electricity for modules A1 and A3
system_boundaries.core_processes: External transportation of materials, manufacturing of concrete (excluding mixing in truck), treatment of waste and wastewater
system_boundaries.downstream_processes: Distribution, installation, wastage on site, transport and treatment of waste at end of life

installation.operational_control: No operational control by Holcim; assumptions based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.activities: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation activities

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process of CO2 absorption by concrete over its lifetime, partially offsetting emissions
carbonation.consideration_in_epd: Not considered in this EPD and not reflected in results

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes

additional_info.sustainability_strategy: Industry's first 2050 net-zero targets endorsed by Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi)
data_sources_and_references: Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water National Waste Report 2022
disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks
Certain impact categories have high uncertainties or limited experience
Ionizing radiation indicator excludes nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal effects
